backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing deposit transactions with multi-currency support and 20% tax calculation, user profiles, winning records, access control with admin/user permissions, and M-PESA payment integration (paybill 400004, account 0116828013).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented authentication features: prominent login button, streamlined AccessDeniedScreen, persistent login state indication with user menu, and accessible logout option.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including profile management, deposit interface with 20% tax display, transaction history, betting history, phone verification for 16 African countries, and Betika green theme styling throughout.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, including custom sidebar, chart, and UI component colors with 0.625rem border radius.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for Betika Casino application with viewport meta tag and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup, sticky header layout containing logo and conditional LoginButton/UserMenu based on authentication state, routing to AdminPage, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Redesigned access denied screen with Betika green gradient theme, Shield icon, feature highlights (secure auth, fund management, real-time dashboard), and prominent 'Sign In Securely' button triggering Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/AdminFundsReleas: Admin interface for managing pending payouts with 20% tax calculation display, showing gross amount, tax deduction, and net payout, with AlertDialog confirmation before releasing winnings to users.
frontend/src/components/DataTable.tsx: Generic data table component that renders tabular data with configurable columns, optional cell formatters, and displays a message when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/DepositSection.t: Deposit form component supporting multiple currencies with exchange rate conversion to KES, 20% tax calculation, and M-PESA payment instructions with paybill/account number copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/UserMenu.tsx: Dropdown menu component displaying user avatar, profile info, and navigation options including logout functionality with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for deposit operations (initiate/confirm), user profile management (get/save), and admin fund release operations with mock data for pending winners and release history.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, Betika green brand colors, and utility classes for consistent styling across the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays fund release management, release history table with tax calculations (20% tax rate), and summary cards showing holding account details and payout statistics. Requires admin authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, including betika-green branding colors, extended theme with sidebar/card/chart colors, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a BETIKA-like betting/casino app with multi-section architecture, M-PESA integration (paybill 400004, account 0116828013), 20% tax system, multi-currency support, and tracking of 30+ implemented features including user profiles, payments, admin dashboard, and game integrations.
